RunNumber01.description: Run number. An integer, possibly prefixed with 0s. Ex: '003' or '01'

TaskName01.description: Name of the task or condition. ONLY numbers, letters and +. Ex: 'rest' or 'headnodding' or 'with+stim'

Acquisition01.description: Type of acquisition of the PET data (for example, "list mode")..

EventsSet01.description: Details about the events associated with this set.

DataFilePath01.description: the path where the Protocole 's file is saved

RunComment01.description: behavior of the subject, technical notes, interruptions etc.
